issue.title: [CF 221] Position updates
issue.body:
I have a icon group anchored to each party/raid frame which are moving dynamically upwards with party size, but with me on top. Right now I have to open the options to update the position of the TMW-groups each time the party size changes. What I wish for is that the the position of TMW are updated on a regular basis without having to open the options.

I don't know if this is possible or can be done in an efficient way without having to load the options, I just hope :) Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok | Imported from CurseForge issue #221 | Raw

comments.body:
Could you attach your saved variables and a few screenshots? I have a few groups set to move dynamically and they work as they should.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This is how it looks like when I log in. The meta group attached to myself is anchored properly. The 4 groups connected to party members are on top of each other in the middle of the screen. This is fine atm as they are not active.

Party size changes to a full party. Groups anchored to party1-4 are still in the middle of the screen.

After a toggle of group locks, the groups gets anchored properly.

I think the problem is that the anchor points doesn't exist until party size changes. When it does, TMW doesn't catch that the frames appear.

I said initially that I needed to open the options, however a group lock toggle is what is needed. The problem is that I usually forget to do so and get all confused with the displacement of the icons :(
Savedvariables


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok

Try r111 and let me know if it solves the problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks for the update. Tried with r112 now and one party member. The icon group anchored to P1 still didn't update it's position until I toggled the group lock.

Adding a member to the party, the self and P1 groups moves their position correctly. P2 stays centered on the screen until I do another toggle.

So I basically still have to "initialize" the anchors manually.


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok

Alright, tested and fixed with anchoring to VuhDo party frames in r113. Note that positions will only update when TMW is locked - if it is unlocked then the group will not move when the party frame is created until TMW is locked again.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks for another update, Sadly I'm away for the moment and won't be able to test it until tomorrow at the earliest.


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok

I've had the chance to test it now, and it seems to work. Big thanks :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Catok
